com.moloco.van.utils

Class NetworkUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.moloco.van.utils.NetworkUtils

  • public abstract class NetworkUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    NetworkUtils provides network connection information.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  NetworkUtils.NetworkType
      NetworkType represents the type of network a device could connect to.
